channel.title: StonerScape! *IN CREATION NEED TIPS!***
channel.description:
[u][b]StonerScape Project[/b][/u]
Hey everyone, i am deciding to start a new server and im gonna be making it called StonerScape :P i haven't really done much yet as i do have some help requests in the server help section for some things i am missing. But i do got all the custom editing in the client under control. I really wanna finish this project here is some thing's its gonna have.
[b]______________________________________________[/b]
[u][b]Marijuana System[/b][/u] -There is Marijuana which is a custom edited guam leaf, what you're gonna be able to do is steal from a stall didn't decide which one yet it will be level 50 thieving req, it will say, you have stole 1 gram of Marijuana. -I have The rolling paper thing figured out :P The Silk Stall will say, you have received 1 blunt wrap and 1 zig-zag. Then i'll re name some note things in the items list.
Right now im just planning out the System that involves Marijuana. Later i'll have seed stalls give you like 1 speed pill and stuff like that.
-I haven't really did much yet in this besides some of the Marijuana part :P Im posting my ideas atm. Umm i'll post pics soon as i get the "marijuana" system done i'll post pics of that.
-Pics (not many yet just the pics i wanna show u) i need the idea for the joint! so i can complete my code with use item and so when u use zig zag and marijuana u get join :) --Only have zig-zag pic atm posting marijuana one in morning. [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/28incic.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/10dyz5c.png[/img]
One thing before i can get the Marijuana system back in progress, what should i use for the joint?
Thx Reply and gimme some tips for this project and get creds if it helps!
::Need Tips::

item.title: StonerScape! *IN CREATION NEED TIPS!***
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

StonerScape Project

Hey everyone, i am deciding to start a new server and im gonna be making it called StonerScape i haven’t really done much yet as i do have some help requests in the server help section for some things i am missing. But i do got all the custom editing in the client under control. I really wanna finish this project here is some thing’s its gonna have.

______________________________________________

Marijuana System
-There is Marijuana which is a custom edited guam leaf, what you’re gonna be able to do is steal from a stall didn’t decide which one yet it will be level 50 thieving req, it will say, you have stole 1 gram of Marijuana.
-I have The rolling paper thing figured out
The Silk Stall will say, you have received 1 blunt wrap and 1 zig-zag. Then i’ll re name some note things in the items list.

Right now im just planning out the System that involves Marijuana. Later i’ll have seed stalls give you like 1 speed pill and stuff like that.

-I haven’t really did much yet in this besides some of the Marijuana part Im posting my ideas atm. Umm i’ll post pics soon as i get the “marijuana” system done i’ll post pics of that.

-Pics (not many yet just the pics i wanna show u) i need the idea for the joint! so i can complete my code with use item and so when u use zig zag and marijuana u get join
–Only have zig-zag pic atm posting marijuana one in morning.

One thing before i can get the Marijuana system back in progress, what should i use for the joint?

Thx Reply and gimme some tips for this project and get creds if it helps!

::Need Tips::
